title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when using SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beeping sound when I choose SWT.MULTI. This behavior is unexpected.
OB: Upon choosing SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText widget emits a beeping sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beeping sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText widget should not emit a beeping sound when using SWT.MULTI. Clicking on other buttons should not trigger any beeping sound.
SR:
1. Launch the application containing the ControlExampleText widget.
2. Navigate to the section that allows selecting the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Choose SWT.MULTI.
4. Observe the beeping sound being emitted.
5. Click on other buttons in the application.
6. Verify that each button click triggers the beeping sound.
